title: 94/1077/EC: Commission Decision of 30 November 1994 amending Decision 93/659/EC on the clearance of the accounts presented by Greece, Spain and Italy in respect of the expenditure for 1990 of the EAGGF, Guarantee Section (Only the Spanish, Greek and Italian texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 30 November 1994 amending Decision 93/659/EC on the clearance of the  accounts presented by Greece, Spain and Italy in respect of the expenditure for 1990 of the EAGGF,  Guarantee Section (Only the Spanish, Greek and Italian texts are authentic) (94/1077/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The parts of the Annex to Decision 93/659/EC relating to Greece,  Spain and Italy are replaced by the Annex hereto.

The amounts of Dr 452 309 736 payable by Greece, Pta 28 191 034 558 payable by Spain  and Lit 403 466 188 800 payable by Italy shall be taken into account as part of the expenditure  referred to in Article 3 of Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2776/88 (4) in accordance with the  following timetable:
>TABLE>
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic, the Kingdom of  Spain and the Italian Republic.
